# QR Code Creator and Reader - React Project

This is a React-based web application for creating and reading QR codes with a modern user interface.

## Project Structure
- React with Vite for fast development
- QR code generation and scanning functionality
- Modern, responsive UI design
- TypeScript support for better development experience

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React hooks and functional components
- Follow responsive design principles
- Implement error handling for QR operations
- Keep components modular and reusable

## Features
- QR Code Generator: Create QR codes from text input
- QR Code Reader: Scan and decode QR codes from images
- Modern UI with clean design
- Mobile-responsive layout
